title: iPhone 11
description1: Apple iPhone 11 comes with 6.1 inches Liquid Retina IPS LCD screen. It has a classical Apple iPhone notch design.
description2: The back camera is of Dual 12+12 MP with powerful image processing capability and Ultra HD 4K video recording. The front camera is of Dual 12 MP and SL 3D camera.
description3: Apple iPhone 11 comes with 3110 mAh battery with 18W fast charging solution.
description4: 4 GB RAM, up to 2.65 GHz hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU.
description5: It is powered by Apple A13 Bionic (7 nm+) chipset. The device comes with 64, 128 or 256 GB internal storage.

title: iPhone 12 Pro-Max
description1: Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max comes with a 6.7 inches Super Retina XDR OLED screen which is one of its main specialties. It has a classical Apple iPhone notch design.
description2: The back camera is of quad 12+12+12 MP + TOF 3D with powerful image processing capability and Ultra HD 4K video recording. The front one is of Dual 12 MP and SL 3D camera.
description3: Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max comes with Li-ion battery with 18W fast charging solution.
description4: It has 6 GB RAM, Hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU. It is powered by a 5 nm Apple A14 Bionic chipset.
description5: The device comes with 128, 256 or 512 GB internal storage.

title: iPhone 13 Pro
description1: Apple iPhone 13 Pro will be launched in September 2021. Its dimensional measure is 146.7 x 71.5 x 7.7 mm and the weight is 204 grams.
description2: The display of the iPhone 13 Pro is a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED panel with 1170 x 2532 pixels resolution.
description3: The display is protected from Scratch-resistant ceramic glass, oleophobic coating.
description4: Most importantly, It is powered by Apple A15 Bionic and runs with iOS 15.
description5: Moreover, it has up to a Hexa-core (2×3.22 GHz + 4xX.X GHz) CPU.

title: iPhone 12 Mini
description1: The Apple iPhone 12 Mini phone body dimensions are 131.5 x 64.2 x 7.4 mm (5.18 x 2.53 x 0.29 in).
description2: It is powered by the Android 10 platform with Apple A14 Bionic (5 nm) chipset.
description3: The primary camera is 12 MP, 12 MP (main) that supports autofocus. And the secondary camera is 12 MP (secondary).
description4: The device comes with 128, 256 or 512 GB internal storage.
description5: It has a Face ID, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer sensors.

title: iPhone 10
description1: The Apple iPhone X (iPhone 10) has a dual-camera setup on the back.
description2: The primary camera is a 12 MP module that is reportedly 60% faster and 30% more efficient.
description3: The higher f/1.8 aperture that should let 50% more light, the new six-element camera lenses, and optical image stabilization.
description4: This sensor has a full focal length, which is 28mm, with the size of 1/3 inch and Phase Detection Auto Focus.
description5: The secondary camera is a telephoto lens with a 2x optical zoom. Users can also choose between the h.264 and h.265 codec.

title: iPhone 11 Pro-Max
description1: Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max comes with a 6.5 inches Super Retina XDR OLED screen which is one of its main specialties.
description2: The back camera is of Triple 12+12+12 MP with powerful image processing capability and Ultra HD 4K video recording. The front camera is of Dual 12 MP and SL 3D camera.
description3: Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max comes with 3969 mAh battery with 18W fast charging solution.
description4: It has 4 GB RAM, up to 2.65 GHz Hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU. It is powered by Apple A13 Bionic (7 nm+) chipset.
description5: The device comes with 64, 256 or 512 GB internal storage. There is no fingerprint sensor in this phone.

title: Apple iPhone XS
description1: The Apple iPhone XS has a dual-camera setup on the back.
description2: The primary camera is a 12 MP module and  extra large 6.5-inch display.
description3: The higher f/1.8 aperture that should let 50% more light, the new six-element camera lenses, and optical image stabilization.
description4: This sensor has a full focal length, which is 28mm, with the size of 1/3 inch and Phase Detection Auto Focus.
description5: The secondary camera is a telephoto lens with a 2x optical zoom. Users can also choose between the h.264 and h.265 codec.

title: iPhone SE (2020)
description1: Apple iPhone SE 2020 comes with 4.7 inches 750 x 1334 pixels Retina IPS LCD screen. It has a classic Apple iPhone design.
description2: The back camera is of single 12 MP with PDAF, dual-LED flash, HDR, OIS etc. and Ultra HD 4K video recording. The front camera is of 7 MP.
description3: iPhone SE 2020 comes with 1821 mAh battery.There is a front-mounted fingerprint sensor in this device.
description4: It has 3 GB RAM and up to 2.65 GHz hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU (4-core graphics). It is powered by Apple A13 Bionic (7 nm+) chipset.
description5: The device comes with 64, 128 or 256 GB internal storage.

title: iPhone 13 mini
description1: Apple iPhone 13 mini will be launched in 2021, September. The iPhone 13 mini was launched with the model numbers A2399, A2176, A2398, 2400, A2630.
description2: Its dimensional measure is 131.5 x 64.2 x 7.7 mm and the weight is 141 grams.
description3: The display of the iPhone 13 mini is a 5.4-inch Super Retina XDR OLED panel with 1080 x 2340 pixels resolution.
description4: It is powered by Apple A15 Bionic and running with iOS 15. Moreover, it has up to a Hexa-core (2×3.22 GHz + 4xX.X GHz) CPU.
description5: The device comes with 128, 256 or 512 GB internal storage.

title: Apple iPhone 8
description1: Apple iPhone 8 is coming with a front and back glass design for the first time in an iPhone. Now you won’t feel any cheap plastic or cold metal while holding your iPhone in hand.
description2: Another fine improvement is its camera. Both front and back camera quality has been improved and they are arguably the best smartphone cameras of 2016.
description3: Better sensor, new color filter, and deeper pixels are some of the new adding in its camera. The True Tone technology ensures a brilliant viewing experience.
description4: The while balance of your display will adjust automatically to the environment around you to give you a clear and comfortable experience.
description5: Not to mention that the color accuracy is also tremendous in iPhone 8.

title: iPhone 6s Plus
description1: Apple iPhone 6S Plus has all the qualities and features of iPhone 6S. Because of the bigger size of the display and higher resolution, it is called 6S “Plus.”
description2: In this smart gadget, Apple used a 5.5 inch Full HD retina display in iPhone 6S plus.
description3: Additionally, both front and back camera has optical image stabilization that stabilizes the picture in case if the hand shakes a little in the last moment of a beautiful capture.
description4: Its dimensional measure is 131.5 x 64.2 x 7.7 mm and the weight is 141 grams.
description5: The device comes with 128, 256 GB internal storage.

title: Apple iPhone XR
description1: Apple decided to release three different smartphones in 2018, Apple iPhone XR, iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max. iPhone XR is the lower priced smartphone among the three.
description2: Apple concentrated mainly in a more advanced “Liquid Retina” display, faster face unlock, faster performance through the all-new Apple A12 Bionic chipset and better camera in this device.
description3: The Liquid Retina LCD will provide vivid and distinguishing colors, sharp and clear viewing experience which is best in the industry according to Apple.
description4: The body is water and dust resistant, the back is made of fine quality glass and the frames with strong aerospace-grade aluminum.
description5: Portrait mode, smart HDR, depth control, the wide-angle lens will help you to capture beautiful photos through both front and the back cameras.

title: Oppo Find N
description1: Oppo Find N 5G will be launched in 2021, December. The Find N launched with model number PEUM00.
description2: Firstly, Its dimensional measure is Unfolded: 132.6 x 140.2 x 8.0 mm, Folded: 132.6 x 73 x 15.9 mm and the weight is 275 grams.
description3: Secondly, the display of Find N 5G is a 7.1-inch Foldable LTPO AMOLED panel with 1792 x 1920 pixels resolution. The display is protecting from the unknown.
description4: Thirdly and most importantly, It is powered by the Qualcomm SM8350 Snapdragon 888 5G (5 nm) and runs with Android 11.
description5: Moreover, it has up to an Octa-core (1×2.84 GHz Kryo 680 & 3×2.42 GHz Kryo 680 & 4×1.80 GHz Kryo 680) CPU.

title: Apple iPhone
description1: Apple iPhone mobile was launched in June 2007. The phone comes with a 3.50-inch display with a resolution of 320x480 pixels.
description2: Apple iPhone is powered by a 412 MHz one-core processor. It comes with 128MB of RAM.
description3: As far as the cameras are concerned, the Apple iPhone on the rear packs 2-megapixel camera.Apple iPhone is based on iOS 3 and packs 4GB of inbuilt storage.
description4: The Apple iPhone measures 115.00 x 61.00 x 11.60mm (height x width x thickness)
description5: Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, barometer, gyroscope, proximity sensor, and compass/ magnetometer.

title: Xiaomi Civi
description1: Xiaomi Civi will be launched in September 2021. The Xiaomi Civi was launched with a model number unknown.
description2: Its dimensional measure is 7 mm and the weight is 166 grams.
description3: The display of Civi is a 6.55-inch AMOLED panel with 1080 x 2400 pixels resolution. The display is protected with Corning Gorilla Glass 3.
description4: It is powered by the Qualcomm SM7325 Snapdragon 778G 5G (6 nm) and running with Android 11.
description5: Moreover, it has up to an Octa-core (4×2.4 GHz Kryo 670 & 4×1.8 GHz Kryo 670) CPU.
